SEARCH
Package gui.model.repository.usuarioRepository

Class UsuarioRepository

java.lang.Object
gui.model.repository.usuarioRepository.UsuarioRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUsuarioRepository
public class UsuarioRepository extends Object implements IUsuarioRepository
UsuarioRepository class

Repository class for managing user data in the SQLite database.
Provides methods for user authentication, insertion, deletion, and retrieval of user data.

Since:
JDK21.0.5
Version:
2.0
Author:
Sacha1083
See Also:
  • - Connection to the SQLite database
  • - SQL statement for executing queries
  • - Result set of a query
  • - User entity class
  • - Manages a list of database drivers
